channel.title: Runserver.bat Problem HELP!
channel.description:
Right i open my runserver.bat and it says 'java is not reconised as a internal or external command'
How do i fix this?
This is the notepad: @echo off title Server cd ./bin/ java -cp .;mysql-connector-java-5.1.8-bin.jar -Xmx512m server.Server pause

item.title: Runserver.bat Problem HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Benjamin1160 Benjamin1160
item.description:
@Benjamin1160 wrote:

If you do have JDK or w/e make sure they match up. That is like 99% of error fix right there. If you dont have it follow the guide above

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver.bat Problem HELP!
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

Wind7

@echo off title Server cd ./bin/ "C:\Program Files (x86)\java\ PUT YOUR VERSION OF JAVA\bin\java.exe" -cp .;mysql-connector-java-5.1.8-bin.jar -Xmx512m .server pause

Xp or Vista

@echo off title Server cd ./bin/ "C:\Program Files\java\ PUT YOUR VERSION OF JAVA\bin\java.exe" -cp .;mysql-connector-java-5.1.8-bin.jar -Xmx512m .server pause

How to find java:

Start button

Computer

Local Disk (C:)

Program Files Folder (VISTA & XP)

or

Program Files (x86) Folder (Wind 7)

There should be a list of folders from the versions of java’s you have

click the the most up-to-date version of java folder

then click the bin folder

and copy the address into the compiler code

but start it off with a quotation mark "

and end it with bin\java.exe"-cp rest of code

or look at the previous examples I gave you

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver.bat Problem HELP!
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“Overload xD, post:1, topic:432007”]Right i open my runserver.bat and it says ‘java is not reconised as a internal or external command’

How do i fix this?

This is the notepad:
@echo off
title Server
cd ./bin/
java -cp .;mysql-connector-java-5.1.8-bin.jar -Xmx512m server.Server
pause[/quote]
Have you downloaded jre and jdk?

Read full topic

item.description:
@Overload_xD wrote:

Right i open my runserver.bat and it says ‘java is not reconised as a internal or external command’

How do i fix this?

title Server
cd ./bin/

pause
